CASE STUDY

Feather and Noise

Shot the "Eyes of a Nomad" collection (consisting of 11 looks) for Feather & Noise which resulted in record-breaking sales for the company. Garnered nearly 20K impressions and reached over 15K unique users via Instagram influencer work. Saw an average engagement rate of 24%.

Photographer

Emilio Kuzma-Floyd

Performance

20K impressions

15K reach

24% engagement

Category
